title: Calling getStatus() on a TestCase object before the respective test has been executed results in type error
body:
| Q                   | A
| --------------------| ---------------
| PHPUnit version     | 7.2.0
| PHP version         | 7.1.18 / 7.2.6
| Installation Method | other ;)

Running php-code-coverage test suite with new PHPUnit 7.2

```
PHPUnit 7.2.0 by Sebastian Bergmann and contributors.

Runtime:       PHP 7.1.18 with Xdebug 2.6.0
Configuration: /dev/shm/BUILD/php-code-coverage-1661926cfa5be825d4f96f89dfac46dc4a19afa8/phpunit.xml

E.....E....SS...........EEEE.......E...........E..E...E..         57 / 57 (100%)

Time: 237 ms, Memory: 12.00MB

There were 10 errors:

1) SebastianBergmann\CodeCoverage\Report\BuilderTest::testSomething
TypeError: Return value of PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase::getStatus() must be of the type integer, null returned

/dev/shm/BUILD/php-code-coverage-1661926cfa5be825d4f96f89dfac46dc4a19afa8/tests/TestCase.php:109
/dev/shm/BUILD/php-code-coverage-1661926cfa5be825d4f96f89dfac46dc4a19afa8/tests/tests/BuilderTest.php:27
```
